markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spelunker](/Feats.aspx?ID=2833) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Shisk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=382" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Living underground, you have learned to find your way without landmarks or even solid ground. If you roll a success on an [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) check to [Sense Direction](/Actions.aspx?ID=64) or an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Climb](/Actions.aspx?ID=33), you get a critical success instead. You're not [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) when you attempt to Climb.
name: Spelunker

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 1" pfs="Standard" > Spelunker Source The Mwangi Expanse pg. 124 2.0 --- Living underground, you have learned to find your way without landmarks or even solid ground. If you roll a success on an Survival check to Sense Direction or an Athletics check to Climb, you get a critical success instead. You're not flat-footed when you attempt to Climb.
